articles.author: Nicolas Camut, Eva Hartog, Sergey Goryashko
articles.title: Tucker Carlson confirms he's interviewing Vladimir Putin - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Controversial ex-Fox News host is in Moscow to talk to the Russian leader.
articles.content: News of Carlsons visit first broke at the weekend after the Mash Telegram channel, rumored to have links to Russian law enforcement, reported hed been spotted in Moscow at the Bolshoi Theater after h… [+1055 chars]
